scripts.build: npm run shader:copy && npx esbuild src/main.js --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js
scripts.build:chrome: npm run manifest:chrome:copy && npm run shader:copy && node esbuild.js chrome
scripts.build:watch: npm run shader:copy && npx esbuild src/main.js --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --watch
scripts.shader:copy: cp -r src/points.frag dist/points.frag && cp -r src/points.vert dist/points.vert
